attributes.action: Those convicted of gang related crimes receive national service
attributes.additional_details:
To combat the gang mentality of 'a sense of belonging', why not enroll those who are convicted of 'gang related crimes' into 1-2 years national service.

Not only will this help to teach young offenders a sense of pride and respect, it will avoid the jail system which is following the US stereotype of 'bad in worse out'

Thank you for reading, I hope you feel the same way as I do.
